description:
Mama`s onslaught continues as Pudding keeps battling the contradictory urges in her head - to kill or kiss Sanji! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper are at Perospero`s mercy - and are being reduced to sweetened versions of themselves!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il faut protéger le Sunny. Chopper et Brook luttent héroïquement !
Rettet die Sunny! – Der erbitterte Kampf von Chopper und Brook
Save the Sunny! Fighting Bravely! Chopper and Brook!
Sunny o Mamore: Funsen! Chopper & Brook
Спасти Санни! Храбрая битва Чоппера и Брука!
إنقاذ السّفينة ساني! يقاتل تشوبّر وبروك بشجاعة!
サニーを守れ 奮戦! チョッパー&ブルック
